data.text: (Clattering…)
data.processed: <story>(Clattering…)

data.text:
The blizzard has gotten really strong… 
The night sky is said to be beautiful up here… 
but we may be unable to see it tonight.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>The blizzard has gotten really strong… 
<story>The night sky is said to be beautiful up here… 
<story>but we may be unable to see it tonight.

data.text:
Woah… It's gotten real rough out there. 
When did that happen…?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Woah… It's gotten real rough out there. 
<story>When did that happen…?

data.text:
It started snowing this bad around 30 minutes ago or so. 
Jeez, have you been absorbed in that game the whole time?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>It started snowing this bad around 30 minutes ago or so. 
<story>Jeez, have you been absorbed in that game the whole time?

data.text: It's cause…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story> 
<story>It's cause…

data.text: What?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>What?

data.text:
Oh, nothing… 
It's gotten as white as your hair out there.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Oh, nothing… 
<story>It's gotten as white as your hair out there.

data.text:
Why would you phrase it that way…? Anyways, if 
the blizzard gets any worse it might affect the 
foothills as well. And if that happens…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Why would you phrase it that way…? Anyways, if 
<story>the blizzard gets any worse it might affect the 
<story>foothills as well. And if that happens…

data.text:
Even if Ticket feels better… 
she might not be able to join us tonight.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Even if Ticket feels better… 
<story>she might not be able to join us tonight.

data.text:
We wouldn't be able to guarantee her safety… And even if we 
told her it was dangerous she'd needlessly push through to try 
and join us. I have to do something…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>We wouldn't be able to guarantee her safety… And even if we 
<story>told her it was dangerous she'd needlessly push through to try 
<story>and join us. I have to do something…

data.text:
Hey, you should stop worrying about Ticket. It's 
the weather after all, so there's no point worrying 
about something you can't control.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you should stop worrying about Ticket. It's 
<story>the weather after all, so there's no point worrying 
<story>about something you can't control.

data.text: But if we leave it as is, Ticket will…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>But if we leave it as is, Ticket will…

data.text:
Plus, she's not the type of person to be stopped by this amount 
of snowfall. She's probably already shouted "sickness and health 
start with the mind" and cured herself.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Plus, she's not the type of person to be stopped by this amount 
<story>of snowfall. She's probably already shouted "sickness and health 
<story>start with the mind" and cured herself.

data.text:
And if you don't come, 
I won't be able to give that to you…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story> 
<story>And if you don't come, 
<story>I won't be able to give that to you…

data.text:
Anyways, Hayahide weren't you the one who said she 
could make miracles happen? If you're gonna believe 
in her, believe in her until the end.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, Hayahide weren't you the one who said she 
<story>could make miracles happen? If you're gonna believe 
<story>in her, believe in her until the end.

data.text: I truly have some great friends, don't I?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>I truly have some great friends, don't I?

data.text: Huh? What's with you?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: <story>Huh? What's with you?

data.text:
Both you and Ticket are always there to provide a perspective 
that I myself do not have. Particularly now. Taishin, having you 
here is truly reassuring.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Both you and Ticket are always there to provide a perspective 
<story>that I myself do not have. Particularly now. Taishin, having you 
<story>here is truly reassuring.

data.text:
You don't hesitate when stating your opinion, and moreover you're 
a caring individual. It's been worrying you that I've been 
preparing the party alone, hasn't it?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>You don't hesitate when stating your opinion, and moreover you're 
<story>a caring individual. It's been worrying you that I've been 
<story>preparing the party alone, hasn't it?

data.text: I'm not worried at all…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: <story>I'm not worried at all…

data.text:
Really? Then let me guess what you were going 
to say earlier. "I play games to pass the time 
since you won't let me help prepare."
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Really? Then let me guess what you were going 
<story>to say earlier. "I play games to pass the time 
<story>since you won't let me help prepare."

data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
Hehe, you are a very kind individual. However, there are times 
where someone wants to take care of the preparations alone in 
order to please their friends.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, you are a very kind individual. However, there are times 
<story>where someone wants to take care of the preparations alone in 
<story>order to please their friends.

data.text:
To put it bluntly, simply having the two of you with 
me brings me all the joy in the world. That's why I've 
been a bit overzealous with my preparation.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>To put it bluntly, simply having the two of you with 
<story>me brings me all the joy in the world. That's why I've 
<story>been a bit overzealous with my preparation.

data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Anyways… maybe we should contact Ticket. 
Something like "we've finished preparations 
here, so take your time…"
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Anyways… maybe we should contact Ticket. 
<story>Something like "we've finished preparations 
<story>here, so take your time…"

data.text: I don't get you… dummy…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story> 
<story>I don't get you… dummy…

data.text: (Rumbling…)
data.processed: <story>(Rumbling…)

data.text: Did you say something?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Did you say something?

data.text:
Nope… It was probably something from outside. It 
seems like the blizzard's gotten even worse…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Nope… It was probably something from outside. It 
<story>seems like the blizzard's gotten even worse…

data.text:
Ah, Ogurin! It wasn't too cold for you out there, 
was it? Don't worry, we've got some warm food being 
made for you, so just wait a little longer!
data.name: Oguri Fan
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Ogurin! It wasn't too cold for you out there, 
<story>was it? Don't worry, we've got some warm food being 
<story>made for you, so just wait a little longer!

data.text:
A-Ahh… Thank you…! 
I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>A-Ahh… Thank you…! 
<story>I'm looking forward to it.

data.text:
I… really am looking forward to it, but… what 
do I do…? I can't decide on a present!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I… really am looking forward to it, but… what 
<story>do I do…? I can't decide on a present!

data.text:
I couldn't find a reindeer, and no matter how much I thought 
about it, I couldn't grow a beard either… I guess I really 
couldn't become Santa… But…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't find a reindeer, and no matter how much I thought 
<story>about it, I couldn't grow a beard either… I guess I really 
<story>couldn't become Santa… But…

data.text: Eeh, there's no star!?
data.name: Fan's Child
data.processed: <story>Eeh, there's no star!?

data.text: What's the matter? Did something happen?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>What's the matter? Did something happen?

data.text:
Ah… It's about the star that was made for the Christmas tree. 
The kids made it specially for this party, so we made sure to 
safely and securely transport it here, but…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Ah… It's about the star that was made for the Christmas tree. 
<story>The kids made it specially for this party, so we made sure to 
<story>safely and securely transport it here, but…

data.text:
A blizzard caused the roads to close down, 
so the truck can't get here.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>A blizzard caused the roads to close down, 
<story>so the truck can't get here.

data.text: I see. So the star won't be arriving…?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I see. So the star won't be arriving…?

data.text:
So the star really isn't coming!? 
It was supposed to surprise Oguri! It was really amazing!
data.name: Fan's Child
data.processed:
<story>So the star really isn't coming!? 
<story>It was supposed to surprise Oguri! It was really amazing!

data.text:
Hmm… I'm sorry to say, but, if they can't use 
the roads then the truck can't come… But don't 
worry, she can see the star tomorrow.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Hmm… I'm sorry to say, but, if they can't use 
<story>the roads then the truck can't come… But don't 
<story>worry, she can see the star tomorrow.

data.text:
But we made it for this Christmas party… 
We made it to help cheer up Oguri…
data.name: Fan's Child
data.processed:
<story>But we made it for this Christmas party… 
<story>We made it to help cheer up Oguri…

data.text: Hey, no need to say those things…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Hey, no need to say those things…

data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
I… humbly apologize for what has happened, but… 
don't worry, once the party starts the children should…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>I… humbly apologize for what has happened, but… 
<story>don't worry, once the party starts the children should…

data.text: I'm going.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I'm going.

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text: I'm going to go get the star.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I'm going to go get the star.
